1.long: elder, usually used as subst.; an elder, a member of the Sanhedrin, an elder of a Christian assembly.
I rebuke, chide, reprove, strike at.
(a) I send for, summon, invite, (b) I beseech, entreat, beg, (c) I exhort, admonish, (d) I comfort, encourage, console.

1.brief: as, like as, how, while, so that
1.long: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.

1.brief: as, like as, how, while, so that
1.long: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.
a brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian.

2.long: elder, usually used as subst.; an elder, a member of the Sanhedrin, an elder of a Christian assembly.

2.brief: as, like as, how, while, so that
2.long: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.

2.brief: as, like as, how, while, so that
2.long: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.
a sister, a woman (fellow-)member of a church, a Christian woman.

2.brief: all, the whole, every kind of
2.long: all, the whole, every kind of.

3.brief: I value at a price, honor
3.long: (a) I value at a price, estimate, (b) I honor, reverence.

4.brief: but, on the other hand, and
4.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
any one, some one, a certain one or thing.
I learn; with adj. or nouns: I learn to be so and so; with acc. of person who is the object of knowledge; aor. sometimes: to ascertain.
first, in the first place, before, formerly.
one's own, belonging to one, private, personal; one's own people, one's own family, home, property.
(a) a house, the material building, (b) a household, family, lineage, nation.
I am dutiful, pious, show piety towards, worship.
a change, an exchange; hence plur: reciprocal good deeds (services), a fitting requital.
(a) I give back, return, restore, (b) I give, render, as due, (c) mid: I sell.

4.brief: worthy to be received, acceptable, welcome
4.long: worthy to be received (welcomed), acceptable, welcome, pleasant.

4.brief: before the face of, in the presence of
4.long: before the face of, in the presence of, in the eyes of.

5.brief: but, on the other hand, and
5.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
I hope, hope for, expect, trust.

5.brief: on, to, against, on the basis of, at
5.long: on, to, against, on the basis of, at.
I remain; I abide in, remain in, persist in, adhere to.
(a) prayer (to God), (b) a place for prayer (used by Jews, perhaps where there was no synagogue).
a day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

6.brief: but, on the other hand, and
6.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
I live extravagantly, luxuriously; I am wanton.
I die, am dying, am dead.

7.long: I notify, command, charge, entreat solemnly.

8.brief: but, on the other hand, and
8.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
any one, some one, a certain one or thing.
one's own, belonging to one, private, personal; one's own people, one's own family, home, property.
I take thought for beforehand, provide for, practice.
faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
(a) I deny (a statement), (b) I repudiate (a person, or belief).
unbelieving, incredulous, unchristian; sometimes subst: unbeliever.

9.brief: I enter in a list, register
9.long: I enter in a list, register, enroll.

9.brief: I come into being, am born
9.long: I come into being, am born, become, come about, happen.

9.brief: a male human being, a man
9.long: a male human being; a man, husband.

10.long: in, on, among.
work, task, employment; a deed, action; that which is wrought or made, a work.
beautiful, as an outward sign of the inward good, noble, honorable character; good, worthy, honorable, noble, and seen to be so.
I witness, bear witness, give evidence, testify, give a good report.
if.
I bring up children, rear young.
if.
I entertain strangers, practice hospitality.
if.
set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred.
the foot.
I wash; mid. I wash my own (hands, etc.).
if.

10.brief: I make narrow, persecute, press hard
10.long: (a) I make narrow (strictly: by pressure); I press upon, (b) I persecute, press hard.

10.brief: I aid, relieve, do service, render help
10.long: I aid, relieve, do service, render help, am strong enough for.
if.

10.brief: all, the whole, every kind of
10.long: all, the whole, every kind of.
work, task, employment; a deed, action; that which is wrought or made, a work.
intrinsically good, good in nature, good whether it be seen to be so or not, the widest and most colorless of all words with this meaning.
I follow close after, accompany, dog; I imitate, pursue, am studious of.

11.brief: but, on the other hand, and
11.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
I beg off, make excuse, deprecate, refuse, reject, decline, shun, avoid.
I marry, used of either sex.
I will, wish, desire, am willing, intend, design.

12.long: (a) a judgment, a verdict; sometimes implying an adverse verdict, a condemnation, (b) a case at law, a lawsuit.
that, since, because; may introduce direct discourse.
faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
I annul, make of no effect, set aside, ignore, slight; I break faith with.

13.brief: at the same time, along with
13.long: at the same time, therewith, along with, together with.

13.brief: but, on the other hand, and
13.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
I learn; with adj. or nouns: I learn to be so and so; with acc. of person who is the object of knowledge; aor. sometimes: to ascertain.

13.brief: I move about, make a circuit, tack
13.long: I go around, move about, visit; I make a circuit, tack (as a ship).
a house, household, dwelling; meton: goods, property, means.

13.brief: but, on the other hand, and
13.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
of persons: over-careful; curious, meddling, a busy-body; of things: over-wrought; superfluous; curious, uncanny; subst: curious arts, magic.
(I talk, chatter in classical Greek, but in NT a more dignified word) I speak, say.
it is necessary, inevitable; less frequently: it is a duty, what is proper.

14.long: I marry, used of either sex.
I bear children, beget, rear a family.
(a) a starting, a start, (b) cause, occasion, opportunity.
I offer, give; I put, place.
I resist, oppose, withstand, lie opposite to.
for the sake of, by reason of, on account of.

15.long: already; now at length, now after all this waiting.
any one, some one, a certain one or thing.
(lit: I turn out from); mid. and pass: I turn aside (from the right road), wander, forsake, and with an object: I remove from myself, shun, avoid.

16.long: any one, some one, a certain one or thing.

16.brief: I aid, relieve, do service, render help
16.long: I aid, relieve, do service, render help, am strong enough for.

16.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
16.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
I weight, load, burden, lit. and met.
an assembly, congregation, church; the Church, the whole body of Christian believers.

16.brief: I aid, relieve, do service, render help
16.long: I aid, relieve, do service, render help, am strong enough for.

17.long: I preside, rule over, give attention to, direct, maintain, practice diligently.
elder, usually used as subst.; an elder, a member of the Sanhedrin, an elder of a Christian assembly.

17.brief: I account or treat as worthy
17.long: I account or treat as worthy.
(a) I grow weary, (b) I toil, work with effort (of bodily and mental labor alike).

17.brief: a word, speech, divine utterance, analogy
17.long: a word, speech, divine utterance, analogy.

18.long: (denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

18.brief: a writing, passage of scripture, the scriptures
18.long: (a) a writing, (b) a passage of scripture; plur: the scriptures.
worthy, worthy of, deserving, comparable, suitable.
a field-laborer; then: a laborer, workman in general.
(a) pay, wages, salary, (b) reward, recompense, punishment.

18.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
18.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.

19.brief: down from, against, according to, throughout, during
19.long: gen: against, down from, throughout, by; acc: over against, among, daily, day-by-day, each day, according to, by way of.
elder, usually used as subst.; an elder, a member of the Sanhedrin, an elder of a Christian assembly.

19.brief: without, outside, except, the outside, apart from
19.long: (a) adv: (1) without, outside, beyond, (2) except, (3) subst: the outside, (b) prep: outside, apart from.

19.brief: on, to, against, on the basis of, at
19.long: on, to, against, on the basis of, at.
a witness; an eye- or ear-witness.

20.long: originally: I miss the mark, hence (a) I make a mistake, (b) I sin, commit a sin (against God); sometimes the idea of sinning against a fellow-creature is present.

20.brief: before the face of, in the presence of
20.long: before the face of, in the presence of, in the eyes of.

20.brief: all, the whole, every kind of
20.long: all, the whole, every kind of.
(a) I reprove, rebuke, discipline, (b) I expose, show to be guilty.
left, left behind, the remainder, the rest, the others.
(a) fear, terror, alarm, (b) the object or cause of fear, (c) reverence, respect.

21.brief: I give solemn evidence, testify solemnly
21.long: I give solemn evidence, testify (declare) solemnly.

21.brief: before the face of, in the presence of
21.long: before the face of, in the presence of, in the eyes of.
Jesus; the Greek form of Joshua; Jesus, son of Eliezer; Jesus, surnamed Justus.

chosen out, elect, choice, select, sometimes as subst: of those chosen out by God for the rendering of special service to Him (of the Hebrew race, particular Hebrews, the Messiah, and the Christians).
a messenger, generally a (supernatural) messenger from God, an angel, conveying news or behests from God to men.
(a) I guard, protect; mid: I am on my guard, (b) act. and mid. of customs and regulations: I keep, observe.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause.

21.brief: down from, against, according to, throughout, during
21.long: gen: against, down from, throughout, by; acc: over against, among, daily, day-by-day, each day, according to, by way of.

22.brief: I put, place upon, lay on
22.long: I put, place upon, lay on; I add, give in addition.

22.brief: I share, communicate, have fellowship with
22.long: (a) I share, communicate, contribute, impart, (b) I share in, have a share of, have fellowship with.
prop: missing the mark; hence: (a) guilt, sin, (b) a fault, failure (in an ethical sense), sinful deed.
belonging to another person, belonging to others, foreign, strange.
(originally, in a condition prepared for worship), pure (either ethically, or ritually, ceremonially), chaste.
I keep, guard, observe, watch over.

23.long: I am only a water drinker.
(a) especially in plur: few, (b) in sing: small; hence, of time: short, of degree: light, slight, little.

23.brief: I use, make use of, deal with
23.long: I use, make use of, deal with, take advantage of.
(a) gen: through, throughout, by the instrumentality of, (b) acc: through, on account of, by reason of, for the sake of, because of.
want of strength, weakness, illness, suffering, calamity, frailty.

24.long: any one, some one, a certain one or thing.

24.brief: a man, one of the human race
24.long: a man, one of the human race.
prop: missing the mark; hence: (a) guilt, sin, (b) a fault, failure (in an ethical sense), sinful deed.
manifest to all, evident, very clear.
(a) trans: I lead forth; in the judicial sense, into court, (b) intrans. and trans: I precede, go before, (c) intrans: I go too far.
into, in, unto, to, upon, towards, for, among.
judging, judgment, decision, sentence; generally: divine judgment; accusation.
any one, some one, a certain one or thing.

24.brief: but, on the other hand, and
24.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
I follow close after, accompany, dog; I imitate, pursue, am studious of.

25.long: in like manner, likewise, just so.
work, task, employment; a deed, action; that which is wrought or made, a work.
beautiful, as an outward sign of the inward good, noble, honorable character; good, worthy, honorable, noble, and seen to be so.
manifest to all, evident, very clear.
